level.heading: Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry reporting requirements.

level.text: The Commissioner shall regularly report violations of this chapter, as well as enforcement actions and other relevant information, to the NMLSR. The reports shall be subject to the provisions of ยง 26-1120.01.
Each licensee shall submit to the NMLSR reports of condition, which shall be in such form and shall contain such information as the NMLSR may require.
